name: Mercure Hotel Hamburg am Volkspark

reviews.title: Much better than previous TA reviews led me to expect
reviews.text: Spent two nights here earlier this month, and it has obviously been given a substantial makeover as well as rebranding recently. Public and bed-rooms smartly decorated and spotlessly clean; standard "continental" breakfast, but plenty of choice and decent coffee. Suburban location, on a small commercial estate of mid-rise blocks housing hi-tech companies.

reviews.title: Mercure Hotel Hamburg am Volkspark (Ex Novotel Hamburg Arena) - Ok hotel close to the O2 World Arena
reviews.text: There are a number of restaurants and coffee-shops in the immediate vicinity, not listed on TA, as well as the hotel's own dining room and bar. It is adjacent to a fairly busy road, but decently soundproofed. Several bus routes connecting with the downtown area pass along the road and stop in front of the hotel. I chose this hotel because I had business in the neighbourhood but as others have said, it is not particularly convenient if you are visiting the downtown area.

reviews.title: Too far from everything
reviews.text: My experience differed from other recent reviewers' in that although there was a charge for WiFi access, it was at least reasonable at 3 Euros for 24 hours and it worked very well. My room was equipped with air conditioning, which I was able to control. However, the bed in my room was very hard and I did not sleep particularly well.

reviews.title: Very average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good size, clean room, perfectly adequate & comfy for the price. Main problem is that a lot of rooms are over the main road & the traffic is horrendous. Air con is in poor order so you really need the window open for air or it is like a greenhouse.
reviews.title: Don't accept a room over the main road !!
Bad and Dirty
reviews.text: That said , we were politely & efficiently given a different room for 2nd night & I asked for some reduction which was promptly agreed without bad feeling ....so 10 out of 10 for that.

reviews.title: very good hotel
reviews.text: Quite easy to get to town, buy a day pass for family, great value, includes a boat trip.

description: The Novotel Hamburg Arena is opposite the harness racing track and close to the stadiums of Hamburg. This 3 star hotel enjoys a quiet yet convenient location, 8 km from the centre and 5 km from the Reeperbahn with a free parking garage and two bus stopsright outside the hotel. We offer 137 spacious, bright, comfortable rooms and six meeting rooms, plus a free internet terminal in the lobby. Guests from around the world rave about our breakfast buffet and enjoy relaxing in our pool and sauna.
